97732.name: Gini index (SEDLAC)
97732.description:
This Gini index measures the distribution of household equivalized income, including zero income. A higher Gini index is indicative of a more unequal distribution of income. 

Where there were multiple observations for a particular year, the observation providing greater coverage (e.g. national rather than urban), or drawn from a more recent round of a survey, is preferred.
97732.datasetName: Inequality in Latin America - SEDLAC (CEDLAS and the World Bank)
